mapper.insert: INSERT INTO evnt (evnt_title, evnt_strt, evnt_end, evnt_pic, evnt_pic_path, evnt_thum_name, evnt_thum_path, evnt_ctnts) VALUES (#{evnt_title}, #{evnt_strt}, #{evnt_end}, #{evnt_pic}, #{evnt_pic_path}, #{evnt_thum_name},#{evnt_thum_path}, #{evnt_ctnts} )

INSERT INTO evnt (evnt_title, evnt_strt, evnt_end, evnt_pic, evnt_pic_path, evnt_thum_name, evnt_thum_path, evnt_ctnts) VALUES (#{evnt_title}, #{evnt_strt}, #{evnt_end}, #{evnt_pic}, #{evnt_pic_path}, #{evnt_thum_name}, #{evnt_thum_path}, #{evnt_ctnts})
